name: claude-memory
description: Persistent memory for Claude across conversations using local markdown files
long_description: Every conversation with Claude starts fresh. This extension fixes that by storing context in simple markdown files on your machine and exposing them through the Model Context Protocol. Each new session can pick up where the last one left off. Memory files are plain markdown stored locally â€” your data never leaves your machine.
